Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Trading Journal Platform for Options Wheel Strategy

Complete trading journal platform implementation including:

## Frontend \(Next.js 16\)
- Dashboard with YTD summary cards, open positions, expiring soon alerts
- Trade management dialogs \(New Trade, Close, Roll, Assign\)
- Depot selector with filtering
- React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations

## Backend \(API Routes\)
- Journal CRUD operations: trades, depots, dividends, settings
- Position lifecycle management: close, roll, assign
- Dashboard aggregation endpoint with YTD statistics

## Database \(DuckDB\)
- Complete journal schema with 13 tables
- Sequences for auto-increment IDs
- Support for wheel strategy lifecycle tracking

## Python Data Sourcing
- Tiingo API integration for stock data
- Database schema initialization
- Seed data scripts for development

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
